Public MustInherit Class RelationalTypeMapping Inherits CoreTypeMapping

summary.para: Represents the mapping between a .NET type and a database type.
This type is typically used by database providers (and other extensions). It is generally not used in application code.

Docs.remarks: See Implementation of database providers and extensions for more information.
